game.match - package game.match
 
GameMode - Interface in game
Interface GameMode represents the actual game of cards that is being played.

This method implements the full strategy.

This method returns the card index that does not belong to a Straight in a "Four to an Inside Straight" draw.

This method returns either true or false depending on if at a specific moment, a bet already occurred or not.
